titleStmt.title: A sermon on occasion of the death of the reverend and learned Mr. Stephen Lobb, who dyed June 3, 1699 by Thomas Goodwin.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1650?-1716?

notesStmt.note: Pages 1-8 at end consist of advertisements.
Imperfect: pages stained, with print showthrough and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
